name: Project T (MrEggroll)
description:
For better experience play in full-screen.

Change weapons by pressing (1, 2, 3, 4)

You can cancel attacks with dodge (spacebar)

Arrows  will fire towards your mouse cursor

You can quick use potions in your inventory by highlighting it and pressing SPACEBAR

The demo is a bit hard but try to beat it as is.

If it is too hard you can level up at the meditation station and there is a pansy mode button in the menu which will give you 1000hp

Of course this is an Alpha build so everything here is subjected to changes.

Please send me your reviews at: knuckleheadsgames@gmail.com
or leave reviews as comments.

Thanks for playing
